title: Trout's EPIC Authorpage
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:collapsible-sidebar]]

[[module CSS]]

.toc {
    z-index: 2;
    text-align: center;
    height: 16rem;
    width: 8rem;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    border: solid black 2px;
    position: -webkit-sticky;
    position: sticky;
    top: 15rem;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
    -webkit-flex-direction: column;
       -moz-box-orient: vertical;
       -moz-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: column;
            flex-direction: column;
    -webkit-transform: translateX(-120%);
       -moz-transform: translateX(-120%);
        -ms-transform: translateX(-120%);
         -o-transform: translateX(-120%);
            transform: translateX(-120%);
}

.toc2 {
    z-index: 2;
    text-align: center;
    height: 16rem;
    width: 8rem;
    background: #FFFFFF;
    border: solid black 2px;
    position: -webkit-sticky;
    position: sticky;
    top: 15rem;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
    -webkit-flex-direction: column;
       -moz-box-orient: vertical;
       -moz-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: column;
            flex-direction: column;
    -webkit-transform: translateX(600%);
       -moz-transform: translateX(600%);
        -ms-transform: translateX(600%);
         -o-transform: translateX(600%);
            transform: translateX(600%);
}

#extra-div-2 {
height: var(--header-height-on-desktop);
width: 100%;
position: absolute;
top: 0;
left: 0;
pointer-events: none;
background-color: black;
background-image: url("https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/fd/Mylohyoid_line_-_animation01.gif?20140725025811");
background-size: calc(var(--header-height-on-desktop) * 1);
}

#header {
-webkit-filter: invert(100%);
filter: invert(100%);
}

[[/module]]

[[image http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/trouts-authorpage/swagtext]]
[[div class="toc"]]
[[size 121%]]**Bonjour**[[/size]]

[[image https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/fd/Mylohyoid_line_-_animation01.gif?20140725025811]]

[[module Rate]]

[[/div]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
--header-title: "tROUT 🍑🍑🍑 REpl1ca";
--header-subtitle: "suck my balls :fire: :fire: :fire:";
--lgurl: url('crudelogo.jpg');
    --logo-image: url("https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/collab:authorpage/trout.png");
}

#content-wrap {
background-image: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/d/de/Priest_on_a_Pillar.png
background-attachment: fixed;
background-repeat: repeat;
background-size: 100%;
}

body {
    cursor: wait;
}
[[/module]]

[[module css]]
:root {
    --bright-accent: 255, 255, 191;
    --medium-accent: 255, 255, 191;
    --dark-accent: 255, 165, 0;
}
[[/module]]

[[module CSS]]
div#extra-div-1 {
     width: 100%;
     height: 100%;
     position: absolute;
     top: calc(var(--final-header-height-on-desktop));
     left: 0;
     z-index: -1;
     background-image: url(https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/collab:authorpage/never4get.png);
     background-size: 100%, 80% var(--background-gradient-distance);
     background-repeat: no-repeat, repeat-x;
     pointer-events: none;
}
[[/module]]

= //hey there, you left me on read haha~//

[[div class="blockquote"]]
Hi, welcome to an intermission. Let's hope you weren't too alarmed by the malarkey going on upstairs. I will say, though, I think every child should be taught every slur in the dictionary so they can avoid saying them in the future. Sure, some might say that is quite the controversial solution to an almost non-existent problem, but do I care? No, not at all.

That being said, here are all the slurs I can name at the top of my head.

[[tabview]]
[[tab SHIT I'VE MADE]]
----


[[div class="turbo-block bg-green"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7921 |SCP-7921]]]
AKA "The Gift From God"
[[/div]]

My first article. This took me way too much fuckin' time to put together. I'm glad it did well, and the photo was drawn by me. It originally had the original logo but i had to change it because that isn't CC. Drats.

Fun fact: They dipped a baby in a deep fryer
----
[[div class="turbo-block bg-red"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7345 |SCP-7345]]]
AKA "Important, Attention Stealing Title!"
[[/div]]

holy SHIT are offsets hard to make. it is because I am a chronic dumbass. This took way too long to do, but I'm happy it has so much positive reception!

Fun fact: This article only exists bc i am salty and hated that my two previous scps were bad. But I got over it.
----
[[include component:image-block name=https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/collab:authorpage/women.png|caption=trout WISHES she was this 😈😈|width=300px]]

[[div class="turbo-block bg-yellow"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5796 |SCP-5796]]]
AKA "But I'll Live, Unfortunately."
[[/div]]

This made me sad when writing it. It made other people sad when reading it. It's about lesbian love, as I am a lesbian. Who craves for love.

Fun fact: The title is based on an ajj song.
----
[[div class="turbo-block bg-grey"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6718 |SCP-6718]]]
AKA "But if there's nothing on the other side?"
[[/div]]

rewroten recently. nice
-----
[[div class="turbo-block bg-black"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7230 |SCP-7230]]]
AKA "Your Voice, as I Remember It"
[[/div]]

Collab between me and [[*user Cubeflix]]! I'm proud of what I put in, Cube is a fuckin' fantastic author.
----
> [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/it-will-all-be-okay |It Will All Be Okay]]]

My first ever tale. Written in a few hours in a manic state, posted after. I really love SCP-6999, so this is my love letter to it.
----
[[div class="turbo-block bg-cyan"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7155 |SCP-7155]]]
AKA "unremarkable"
[[/div]]

This one took me some time to get right, but I'm proud of it. generally unremarkable.
----
[[div class="turbo-block bg-purple"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7084 |SCP-7084]]]
AKA "I don't care who the IRS sends I am not paying taxes"
[[/div]]

The title is from a clip from Dan Vs. This one is a silly format break and i stole the icon from Harry. Sorry, Harry.

Also, this is the dumbest thing ive ever made. taxes. it got +100
----

[[div class="turbo-block bg-orange"]]
[[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6289 |SCP-6289]]]
AKA "THE WIZARD."
[[/div]]

This is probably my favorite page I've made. Other people love it, I love it, it's great.

[[=image https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/collab:authorpage/WIZARDSEX.png width="300px"]]
----
[[div class="turbo-block bg-blue"]]
[[[SCP-6294]]]
AKA "Cold, Cold, Cold"
[[/div]]

Chugwater! Collab between me and [[*user sytycfanon]] about the cold.
----
[[div class="turbo-block bg-red"]]
[[[SCP-7973]]]
AKA "Abnnormalization"
[[/div]]

Expecting it to be +100. Its around +40. Sad! Still happy abt it...
----

[[/div]]

Appliance war. All I'm saying about it.

open to be rewritten, if anybody wants to go ahead and do that!

**[[*user Caospin]]:** The Super Rotation System (SRS for short) is a rotation system used in nearly all official modern tetris variants since Tetris Worlds (2001). This is widely due to the establishment of the tetris guideline. In SRS, all pieces have four rotation states and can be rotated counterclockwise or clockwise. Many SRS variants include the option to rotate 180 degrees. A notable feature of SRS and many modern rotation systems is when a rotation fails due to a block rotating into another block or out of bounds. When this happens, SRS will attempt to “kick” the block through a series of four translations which are determined by the direction of the rotation and the last rotation state. The kick tables are consistent among the 5 blocks with bounding boxes of size three. The I piece has a unique kick ta [[CHARACTER LIMIT REACHED]]

**[[*user pab07]]:** Pour up to half a litre of boiling water on a big handful of dried mushrooms, cover and let steep for at least half an hour. Get some olive oil/butter in a pan, once its foaming add your finely chopped 2 shallots and garlic, fry until the onions are getting a little brown around the edges, careful not to burn the garlic. Add in the 6-7 sliced button mushrooms, sweat them for a little and let them brown, then add your sliced celery. Fry that for a little, add your miso paste, fry a little more, add the flour, fry just a little more, all the time taking care not to burn anything. Then deglaze with the mushroom stock,  adding more to achieve the desired consistency. Flavour with soy sauce and black pepper. Boil some gnocchi, drain once ready, add to the sauce and mix. Add fresh herbs of your choice as a flavouring and for colour. Then add in your reactor core graphite rods and

[[include component:image-block name=https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/collab:authorpage/silverplatter.jpg|caption=😭😭😭😿|width=300px]]
[[div style="text-align:justify;"]]
last tuesday, smth happened, smth bad.

scp author trout ass replica (aka known as tax evader, the no-grass toucher, the bitchless boatdweller, etc etc) was recently found face planted on the ground by her car some 20 miles from her place. evidence suggests that some based sigma male skibidi'd the lack of rizz outta her, causing trout to spontaneously combust and lead her vehicle into a ditch (bitch).

following a four second investigation, its been found out that the scrimblo bomblo behind the oopsie woopsie behind her fuckie wuckie is none other then lil goober noober itself (cat :3). interviews with the baby with the smol lil knitted hat has mainly boiled down to "literally deserved, get rekt, fire emoji fire emoji." survey says true, everyone else applaud and asked for an encore. this event will be reenacted as many times as possible so that all the world can see how trout ended up disintegrating into ash bc of some bibby tibby.

per trout;s wish, all her money and possessions have been given to the TSA (Tumblr Sexyman Association) in an effort to dissuade the people from sticking their gyatt out for the onceler for the fifteenth time this week. donate now if u want the world to just implode on itself, no number of prayers is enough for the betterment of humanity. hell is where we live and where we go, death is but a temporary step outside.

it should be noted that trout's cause of death was the deletion of all her articles reaching -100 in votes. actually beta moment right here, folks. thanks for reading.
[[/div]]

[[include component:image-block name=https://scp-sandbox-3.wikidot.com/local--files/collab:authorpage/nya.jpg|caption=lil goober|width=500px|align=center]]
[[/div]]

1. dont remove other peoples stuff unless its minor

4. make sure tech team wont hang me in the streets
